grahampaige.comment:
That is correct Mr. Page. The motion passes seven zero. We do now move onto closed session. Mrs. Carlson could you please read
into our minutes tonight's motions moving us into close sessions per Virginia State Code Section 2341 exemption number three concerning discussions about specific public business involving consultation consideration an award of contract concerning prospective business location effort discretionary matters where competition publicity disclosure might damage financial interest of locality involved parties. It involves ACPS property acquisition disposition lease consulting services related thereto real estate purchase sale disposal lease consultations investment acquiring competitive negotiating strategies confidential written advice concerned legal counsel employed retained regarding specifically identified matter having assigned them known numbered file code designation VSBA versus Albemarle County School Board et al., which has received approval through Freedom Information Act request response dated October eighth two thousand twenty-one. Number five FERPA ID redaction hearings held electronically pursuant to Virginia State Law due to health pandemic declared statewide emergency announced March twelfth two thousand twenty by Governor Ralph Northam and extended until June thirtieth two thousand twenty-two by governor Glenn Youngkin plus other governing statues cited within resolution authorizes remote meetings electronic participation noticed hereby given local ordinance adopted February eleven two thousand nineteen section sixteen dash nine point eight four minus six effective July first two thousand nineteen being chapter thirty-three hundred ninety-six slash eighteen dash thirteen dot ten of county codified ordinances entitled authorization councilman participate virtually certain meetings prescribed circumstances authorized thereby subsection A thereof permits virtual attendance otherwise applicable law required physical presence quorum present physically located among locations connected remotely using shared communications medium chosen available public access permitted appropriate arrangements presiding officer shall facilitate public comment opportunity provided prior each regular afternoon work session beginning time posted agenda item order call upon chair vice-chair conduct such hearing may limit oral presentations heard via Zoom webinar platform based length signed up speakers' list established previously stated procedures followed thereafter roll called determine whether majority voting authority then joined open session reconvened immediately adjournment executive session certify poll recorded clerk reading minute certification document approved next
